title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: Dod, I imagine it's laughin' an' jeerin' at them.

title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: Dod, doctor, was it no' a stupid ploy--sic thochtlessstravaigin'--five oors oot o' the hoose in snell weather like this, an'him as shaky on his legs as a footrule?
